name: Daily
headline: Conversational Voice and Multimodal AI built with Open Source
description: Daily is real-time voice, video, and AI for developers. Our cross-platform SDKs and global infrastructure enable ultra-low latency, highest quality experiences for developers building real-time voice and video AI agents. Our platform also supports integration of traditional voice/video calls, in addition to AI agent experiences.

# Build voice agents at scale, on open source
Daily is the team behind Pipecat. Build with ultra low latency, open source SDKs, and enterprise reliability since 2016.
START BUILDING
DOCS
Try a live demo. Talk to a voice AI agent
![Accenture](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/accenture.svg)
![NVIDIA](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/nvidia.svg)
![Google](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/google.svg)
![Mercor](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/mercor.svg)
![Vapi](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/vapi.svg)
![Tavus](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/tavus.svg)

![Florecruit](https://daily.co/images/ai/logos/florecruit.svg)

![Bevy](https://daily.co/images/ai/logosv2/bevy.svg)
## [PLATFORM]
## Pipecat
Pipecat is a vendor-neutral open source orchestration framework for real-time voice and multimodal AI agents.
[START BUILDING](https://daily.co/<https:/pipecat.ai>)
## Daily Bots
Daily Bots is our Pipecat Cloud offering. Deploy AI agents, built with Open Source SDKs, on Daily's global infrastructure. Get early access to [Pipecat Cloud](https://daily.co/</products/pipecat-cloud>) - run any Pipecat pipeline in the cloud.
[LEARN MORE](https://daily.co/</products/daily-bots/>)
## Daily Infrastructure
Run realtime calls on Daily's WebRTC global infrastructure. Deploy Pipecat-built agents on Daily transport. Our platform also supports building and hosting human/human calls.
[PIPECAT TRANSPORT](https://daily.co/<https:/docs.pipecat.ai/api-reference/services/transport/daily#daily>)[MORE ABOUT VIDEO INTEGRATION](https://daily.co/</products/video-sdk/>)
## [INFRASTRUCTURE]
## Scale with Daily's Global Mesh Network
Since 2016, our infrastructure and WebRTC-native SDKs deliver the best possible video quality on every network, for every device, everywhere in the world.
Daily's team includes authors of WebRTC standards, video technology pioneers, and engineers with deep experience in codecs, real-time networking, and infrastructure.
[LEARN MORE](https://daily.co/</blog/global-mesh-network/>)
![Infrastructure](https://daily.co/_next/image/?url=%2Fimages%2Fai%2Fglobal-mesh-minimal.png&w=640&q=75)
13ms
Median first-hop latency
Lowest latency real-time video and audio.
75+
Global points of presence
Battle-tested multi-cloud architecture.
4×
Better video resolution
Compared to Agora in real-world network tests.
2×
Faster connection times
Optimized connection establishment and routing.
## [ENTERPRISE]
## Enterprise-grade security
Comprehensive data security, compliance, and uptime SLAs. Daily offers true end-to-end encryption, provides signed HIPAA BAAs, and operates under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework.
[VISIT OUR SECURITY CENTER](https://daily.co/</security>)
99.99%
Service uptime
SOC-2
GDPR
HIPAA
## [TESTIMONIALS]
• 01• 02• 03• 04
From a development and a speed-to-market standpoint, Daily has been tremendous - we've got something up and working in less than two months.
![Brandon Webber](https://daily.co/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F115659%2F1721141715-1593018046875.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Brandon Webber
Managing Director @ Accenture
Our video infrastructure is the single-most important decision when it comes to choosing a vendor. It's critical that we have the right partner ... Daily was much more flexible and easy to work with [than our previous vendor].
![Yang Mau](https://daily.co/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F115659%2F1705440998-yang-mou.jpg&w=3840&q=75)
Yang Mau
CEO and Co-Founder @ Kumospace
The documentation was super clear and thorough. It’s one of the main reasons we decided to partner with Daily.
![Mike Galanos](https://daily.co/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F115659%2F1705440411-mike-galanos.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Mike Galanos
CTO @ Focusmate
We outgrew Zoom, almost immediately.
![Matt Douglass](https://daily.co/_next/image/?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.datocms-assets.com%2F115659%2F1705445028-matt-douglass.jpeg&w=3840&q=75)
Matt Douglass
CTO @ Beepboop
## [CONTRIBUTIONS]
## Open Source
Daily is a [W3C WebRTC Working Group](https://daily.co/<https:/www.w3.org/2011/04/webrtc/wiki/Main_Page>) member and maintains [Pipecat](https://daily.co/<https:/github.com/pipecat-ai/pipecat>), an open-source framework for voice and multimodal AI. We also contribute to several open-source projects, including [Mediasoup](https://daily.co/<https:/mediasoup.org/>) and [GStreamer](https://daily.co/<https:/gstreamer.freedesktop.org/>).
[pipecat-ai/pipecatPython4769541](https://daily.co/<https:/github.com/pipecat-ai/pipecat>)

generated_description:
### Daily: Revolutionizing Real-Time Communication

**Overview**  
Founded in 2016 and hailing from Y Combinator's Batch W16, Daily is a San Francisco-based startup that's making waves in the AI and real-time communication space. With a dedicated team of 62 employees, Daily aims to empower developers to create conversational voice and multimodal AI experiences using their open-source tools.

**Mission**  
At its core, Daily is about harnessing **real-time voice, video, and AI** technologies. Their mission is clear: They want to democratize access to powerful communication tools by enabling developers to build sophisticated AI agents while ensuring low latency and high-quality experiences. This mission aligns beautifully with today’s demand for instant, seamless communication.

**Key Offerings**  
Daily’s platform is centered around their **cross-platform SDKs** and a robust global infrastructure that supports a range of functionalities:
- **Voice and Video APIs**: Integrate traditional voice and video calling into applications.
- **Pipecat**: An open-source orchestration framework designed for real-time voice and multimodal AI agents, enabling developers to build scalable AI solutions.
- **Daily Bots**: A cloud service that allows for the deployment of AI agents using Daily's powerful infrastructure.
  
The company boasts an infrastructure optimized for speed and reliability, with a median first-hop latency of just 13ms and over 75 points of presence globally. This means developers can deliver top-notch video and audio experiences, no matter where users are located.

**Security and Compliance**  
Daily places heavy emphasis on security. They offer comprehensive data protection measures, including end-to-end encryption and compliance with best practice regulations such as HIPAA and GDPR.

**Notable Partnerships**  
Daily has established strong relationships with major players in the tech industry, partnering with companies like Accenture, NVIDIA, Google, and Pinterest. These collaborations highlight Daily’s credibility and effectiveness in enhancing real-time communication capabilities for developers.

**Community and Open Source Contributions**  
As an active member of the W3C's WebRTC Working Group, Daily is committed to advancing open standards and open-source technologies. The company not only supports projects like Pipecat but also contributes to initiatives like Mediasoup and GStreamer, thereby fostering innovation in the developer community.

**Impressive Testimonials**  
Key stakeholders in various organizations have praised Daily's efficiency and flexibility in enhancing their communication infrastructure. From fast deployments to straightforward documentation, Daily has cemented its reputation as a developer-friendly solution.

### Summary  
With a clear mission to elevate developer tools for real-time voice and video communications, Daily is carving a niche in the AI landscape. Their commitment to open-source, security, and developer empowerment makes them a significant player to watch in the evolving tech space. If you’re looking to integrate powerful communication technologies, 🏗️ **get started** with Daily for free at [daily.co](https://daily.co).
